your-wallet-card.desc-1: This screen helps you put your tokens to work with as few clicks as possible. If the 'Supply' or 'Deposit' buttons are active, there's a lending and/or vault opportunity available for that token. Just click to see the strategy and current yield.
your-wallet-card.desc-2: Remember, these tools make it easy to access the tech, but you are responsible for understanding and actively managing your positions.
